original_text: I was angry with the leaders of Judah. I said to them, ‘You are doing an evil thing. You are not making the Sabbath a special day.
korean_text: 내가 유다의 모든 귀인들을 꾸짖어 그들에게 이르기를 너희가 어찌 이 악을 행하여 안식일을 범하느냐

sentences.original_text: I was angry with the leaders of Judah.
You are not making the Sabbath a special day.'
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 안식일을 특별한 날로 만들지 않고 있구나.'
